items.sentence: I think Tom is going to be pretty mad when he finds out that the painting he bought is a fake.
I think if I talked more often with a native speaker, my English skills would improve quickly.
Several men got angry with Tom in the bar and Tom told them he wasn\'t afraid to take them on.
Tom called Mary to ask her whether she wanted him to buy some bread on his way home from work.
Tom wished he had had the courage to jump into the river and save the baby that had fallen in.
